context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified working: 1) Batch PDF export via POST /api/certificates/batch-pdf, 2) 4 cursive fonts in template editor (Dancing Script, Great Vibes, Parisienne, Allura) with TTF files in /app/backend/fonts/, 3) representative_name_3 field support in batch upload, 4) Browser title changed to 'Certificados | Academia Jotuns Club SAS', 5) Emergent badge removed from index.html.
